FuncDef: The reset ike statistics command clears the statistics of the IKE packets.
CLIs: reset ike statistics { all | msg } [ slot <slotnumber> ]
reset ike statistics { all | msg } [ slot <slotnumber> [ engine <engine-id> | card <card-id> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Clear the information in a specified slot.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 32.

Indicates the engine ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 1.

Indicates the card ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 1.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You cannot restore the statistics once statistics are cleared.
engine and card options are supported only on the VSU board.
